description:
With the four heroines incapable of teamwork, Kikuru suggests they take the day off to bond with each other. Which gives him time to ponder the unusual behavior of monsters.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Jouons ensemble / Tu es mon premier
Lasst uns was unternehmen / Mein erstes Mal
Let`s All Hang Out / You`re My First
Minna de Asobou / Anata ga Hajimete Desu
Давай поиграем вместе / Ты у меня первый
みんなで遊ぼう / あなたが初めてです
